滋.definition: to grow; to nourish; to increase; to cause; juice; taste; (dialect) to spout; to spurt

滋事.definition: to cause trouble; to provoke a dispute

滋擾.definition: to cause trouble; to provoke a dispute

滋潤.definition: moist; humid; to moisten; to provide moisture; comfortably off

滋生.definition: to breed; to flourish; to cause; to provoke; to create

滋長.definition: to grow (usually of abstract things); to yield; to develop

滋養層.definition: trophoblastic layer (attaches fertilized ovum to the uterus); trophoderm
